channel.title: Uintah County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Uintah County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-191 North - Flaming Gorge Uintas Scenic Byway
item.description: US-191 North - Flaming Gorge Uintas Scenic Byway in Uintah County.

item.title: US-191 North - Flaming Gorge Uintas Scenic Byway
item.description: US-191 North - Flaming Gorge Uintas Scenic Byway in Uintah County.

item.title: US-191 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-191 north. Distance to Dutch John, Manila, and Rock Springs (Wyoming).

item.title: US-40 East/US-191 North at US-191 North
item.description: US-40 East/US-191 North (Main St.) at US-191 North (Vernal Ave.) to Steinaker Reservoir, Red Fleet Reservoir, and Flaming Gorge.

item.title: US-191 North/US-40 East Approaching US-191 North
item.description: US-191 North/US-40 East (Main St.) approaching US-191 North (Vernal Ave.) in Vernal.

item.title: US-40 East/US-191 North at UT-121 West
item.description: US-40 East/US-191 North at UT-121 West (N 500 W) in Vernal.

item.title: US-40 East/US-191 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-40 East/US-191 North. Distance to Vernal and Denver (Colorado).

item.title: US-40 East/US-191 North at UT-88 South
item.description: US-40 East/US-191 North at UT-88 South in Uintah County. Use UT-88 south for Ouray. Continue on US-40/US-191 for Vernal.

item.title: US-40 East/US-191 North Approaching UT-88
item.description: US-40 East/US-191 North approaching UT-88 in Uintah County.

item.title: US-40 East/US-191 North - Uintah County
item.description: Entering Uintah County on US-40 East/US-191 North. The Uintah/Duchense county boundary also marks the boundary between the cities of Roosevelt and Ballard.

item.title: US-40 West at UT-88 South
item.description: US-40 West at UT-88 South in Uintah County.

item.title: US-40 West Approaching UT-88
item.description: US-40 West approaching UT-88 south to Ouray in Uintah County. Continue west on US-40 for Roosevelt.

item.title: US-40 East at UT-121 West
item.description: US-40 east at UT-121 west in Vernal.

item.title: US-40 West at US-191
item.description: US-40 West at US-191 north to Rock Springs (Wyoming) and Flaming Gorge. US-191 joins US-40 West to Duchense.

item.title: US-40 West at UT-45 South
item.description: US-40 West at UT-45 South in Naples.

item.title: US-40 West at UT-45 Jct.
item.description: US-40 west at UT-45 south to Deseret Generation Power Plant, Bonanza, and Book Cliffs Access.

item.title: US-40 West Approaching UT-45
item.description: US-40 West approaching UT-45 in Naples.

item.title: US-40 West at UT-149
item.description: US-40 West at UT-149 north to Dinosaur National Park.

item.title: Redwash Road North at US-40
item.description: Redwash Road North at US-40 to Salt Lake City and Denver. This sign is odd in that destinations for far away locations are used on a county road.

item.title: US-40 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-40 west. Distance to Jensen, Vernal, and Salt Lake City. This is the first distance marker along US-40 in Utah.

item.description: US-40 East/US-191 North in Vernal.
